content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the klaipeda district court the case involved the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court decided to divide the property in kind with the applicant receiving two cars and the defendant receiving a nonresidential premises and a car the court also addressed other issues related to the divorce including the establishment of a place of residence for their minor daughter and the repayment of a loan the court considered the best interests of the child and ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the court ultimately dissolved the marriage and awarded certain assets to each party

metadata.cost: 100.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 500.00 EUR (professional fees) + 6.64 EUR (court fees)
